title: Book Cover, "Poetry Series: An Introductory Anthology"
description: Front cover, inside of large vertical rectangle, sketched image of black wide-brimmed bucket hat above editor's name on two lines and below title and subtitle in black text on cream-colored ground. Vertical rectangle is superimposed on repetitive Faber and Faber logo pattern in gray and blue. Back cover, large vertical rectangle containing Faber and Faber logo and two paragraphs of book description. Vertical rectangle superimposed on repetitive Faber and Faber logo pattern in gray and blue. Spine, title and subtitle parallel to editor's name all in black text, inside of rectangle with cream ground. Title, subtitle and editor's name all in black text, below Faber and Faber logo in black text. Along upper and lower edges of spine, thick bands of Faber and Faber logo pattern.

tombstone.epitaph: Book Cover, "Poetry Series: An Introductory Anthology". offset lithography. Gift of Steven Heller. 1996-74-165.
